pageTitle: Prime Ministerâ€™s itinerary for Monday, March 20, 2023 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

National Capital Region, Canada

Private meetings

7:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will participate in a town hall with local tech employees.

Notes for media:

  • Open coverage
  • Media are asked to arrive no later than 6:15 p.m.
  • Media interested in participating can contact media@pmo-cpm.gc.ca for details.
